com.bandyer.core_av.capturer

Class AbstractBaseCapturer<T>

  • com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.AbstractBaseCapturer<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CapturerAV, CapturerAudio, CapturerVideo

    public class AbstractBaseCapturer<T>

    Abstract class defining how the capturers must behave

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      AbstractBaseCapturer(android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity context)
      Abstract class defining how the capturers must behave

      returns the capturer current state
      Stream getStream()
      Captured audio or video
      T pause()
      pause the capturer, called onPause of the activity If you manually pause the capturer it will not automatically resume onResume of the activity.

      Method to remove an observer from

      resumes the capturer if it has been paused, called onResume of the activity

      • pause

        public T pause()

        pause the capturer, called onPause of the activity If you manually pause the capturer it will not automatically resume onResume of the activity.

        starts the capturer, called by the user
